lead_paragraph: FREDERICK--William E.,a retired textile executive and passionate golfer, formerly of Montclair, NJ and Sea Island, GA, died February 29, 2016 at his home in Vero Beach, FL. He was 92. Mr. Frederick began his 40 year career at Cannon Mills in New York City. He later joined West Point Pepperell, becoming President of Consumer Products, and finally at M. Lowenstein Corp., where he served as Senior Vice President of the company and President of the Home Products Division. He is survived by his wife of 64 years, Marion Kerr Frederick, his three children Kerrie Frederick, William E. Frederick, Jr. and Dale Frederick Horne and his three grandchildren, Elizabeth, Reilly and Samuel. At Mr. Frederick's request, there will be no formal service. Interment will be at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Upper Montclair, NJ, where services will be private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FREDERICK, WILLIAM E.
